thread.title: VERBATIM: Trump slams NAFTA at autos meeting

title: VERBATIM: Trump slams NAFTA at autos meeting
text:
VERBATIM: Trump slams NAFTA at autos meeting 11:18am BST - 01:02
U.S. President Donald Trump met with senior leaders of major U.S. and foreign automakers at the White House on Friday, and discussed planned fuel efficiency rule changes through 2026. He also commented on making changes to the North American Free Trade Agreement.
